languages.text: Монолиты нависают над небольшой равниной — черные, зловещие и непостижимые, как и раса, создавшая их.

traits.locale_text: Зловещее дыхание пирамид держит вас в напряжении и неведении. Похоже, это формации все тех же ксеносов — непостижимых некронов.

languages.text: The monoliths loom over the small plain — black, ominous, as inscrutable as the race that created them.
languages.original_text: Монолиты нависают над небольшой равниной — черные, зловещие и непостижимые, как и раса, создавшая их.

traits.locale_text: The monoliths loom over the small plain — black, ominous and inscrutable like the race that created them.
The monoliths loom over the small plain — black, ominous and inscrutable like the race that created them.
The monoliths loom over the small plain — black, ominous, as inscrutable as the race that created them.
The monoliths loom over the small plain — black, ominous, as inscrutable as the race that created them.
The monoliths loom over the small plain — black, ominous, as inscrutable as the race that created them.
The monoliths loom over the small plain — black, ominous, as inscrutable as the race that created them.

languages.text: 那些巨物高高矗立在小小的平原上。充满不祥意味的黑色舰体，就像曾创造出它们的种族一样深不可测。
languages.original_text: The monoliths loom over the small plain — black, ominous, as inscrutable as the race that created them.

traits.locale_text: 那些巨物高高矗立在小小的平原上。充满不祥意味的黑色舰体，就像曾创造出它们的种族一样深不可测。

languages.text: Noirs et menaçants, les monolithes dominent la petite plaine, aussi impénétrables que le peuple qui les a créés.
languages.original_text: The monoliths loom over the small plain — black, ominous, as inscrutable as the race that created them.

traits.locale_text: Noirs et menaçants, les monolithes dominent la petite plaine, aussi impénétrables que le peuple qui les a créés.

languages.text: 小さな平原にモノリスがそびえたっている――黒く、不気味で、作りだした種族と同様、謎に満ちている。
languages.original_text: The monoliths loom over the small plain — black, ominous, as inscrutable as the race that created them.

traits.locale_text: 小さな平原にモノリスがそびえたっている――黒く、不気味で、作りだした種族と同様、謎に満ちている。

languages.text: Los monolitos se yerguen sobre la pequeña llanura, negros, ominosos y tan inescrutables como la raza que los creó.
languages.original_text: The monoliths loom over the small plain — black, ominous, as inscrutable as the race that created them.

traits.locale_text: Los monolitos se yerguen sobre la pequeña llanura, negros, ominosos y tan inescrutables como la raza que los creó.

languages.text: Die Monolithen überragen die kleine Ebene — schwarz, bedrohlich, so unergründlich wie das Volk, das sie erschaffen hat.
languages.original_text: The monoliths loom over the small plain — black, ominous, as inscrutable as the race that created them.

traits.locale_text: Die Monolithen überragen die kleine Ebene — schwarz, bedrohlich, so unergründlich wie das Volk, das sie erschaffen hat.

languages.text: Monolitler, küçük düzlükte yükseliyor. Karanlık, uğursuz ve kendilerini yaratan ırk kadar gizemliler.
languages.original_text: The monoliths loom over the small plain — black, ominous, as inscrutable as the race that created them.

traits.locale_text: Monolitler küçük ovada yükseliyor. Karanlık, uğursuz ve kendilerini yaratan ırk kadar gizemliler.
